name: website-html-to-markdown
description: Folder containing the scripts to run the html-to-markdown conversion scripts
author: HashiCorp Design Systems <design-systems@hashicorp.com>

scripts.generate: yarn prepare-temp-folder && yarn copy-source-files && yarn identify-sections && yarn split-files && yarn replace-linkto-with-a && yarn refactor-codeblocks && yarn refactor-properties && yarn enrich-wcag-lists && yarn preprocess-files && yarn convert-to-markdown && yarn prettify-files && yarn prepare-dest-folder && yarn copy-markdown-files && yarn copy-assets-folder && yarn copy-moveover-files && yarn postprocess-files && yarn cleanup-temp-folder
scripts.prepare-temp-folder: rm -fr temp && mkdir temp && mkdir temp/original
scripts.identify-sections:
echo '
==========
Identifying <section> blocks...
' && node codemods/bin/cli.js identify-sections ./temp/original/**/*.hbs
scripts.replace-linkto-with-a:
echo '
==========
Replacing <LinkTo> with <a> links...
' && node codemods/bin/cli.js replace-linkto-with-a ./temp/split-files/**/*.hbs
scripts.refactor-codeblocks:
echo '
==========
Refactoring <CodeBlock> instances...
' && node codemods/bin/cli.js refactor-codeblocks ./temp/split-files/**/how-to-use.hbs
scripts.refactor-properties:
echo '
==========
Refactoring <dl> instances...
' && node codemods/bin/cli.js refactor-properties ./temp/split-files/**/component-api.hbs
scripts.enrich-wcag-lists:
echo '
==========
Enriching WCAG lists...
' && node codemods/bin/cli.js enrich-wcag-lists ./temp/split-files/**/accessibility.hbs
scripts.prettify-files:
echo '
==========
Prettifying markdown files...
' && npx prettier --loglevel warn --write temp/split-files
scripts.prepare-dest-folder: rm -fr ../website/docs/components && mkdir ../website/docs/components && rm -fr ../website/docs/content && mkdir ../website/docs/content && rm -fr ../website/docs/foundations && mkdir ../website/docs/foundations && rm -fr ../website/docs/overrides && mkdir ../website/docs/overrides && rm -fr ../website/docs/utilities && mkdir ../website/docs/utilities && rm -fr ../website/docs/testing && mkdir ../website/docs/testing
scripts.copy-markdown-files:
echo '
==========
Copying markdown files to `docs` folder...
' && cp -r ./temp/markdown/* ../website/docs/
